page.title: 05PENRHYN BEACH LITTLE ORME
page.content:
I live on the Penrhyn Beach Estate. The houses round us are nearly all either holiday homes or the people are retired so we don't see much of them. One of my neighbours works. Most people near us spend their time in their gardens mowing the lawns or picking out weeds. There aren't many dogs; infact the nearest one is about a quarter of a mile away. There aren't many children because most families live in Llandudno. I do like living there because I get away from the noise of Llandudno do my own thing. My parents will probably stay on the estate but I think I will move away.
Michael(11)
